DOC.HEADLINE: POP EYE
DOC.TEXT: ALSO DUE : Also on the release schedule during the next six months ( dates are tentative ) : January : Alice in Chains , Crowded House , NKOTB ( the new moniker for the New Kids on the Block ) , Shonen Knife , Ce Ce Peniston . February : Tori Amos , the Beastie Boys , Hammer , Richard Marx . March : Anthrax , Anita Baker , Beck , Boston , Elvis Costello , DJ Quik , Ted Hawkins , Heavy D . & the Boyz , Helmet , Tom Jones , Morrissey , Motley Crue , Sam Phillips , Pretenders , Right Said Fred , David Lee Roth , Boz Scaggs , Seal and Keith Sweat . April : Black_Box , Johnny Cash , Deee-Lite , Marianne Faithfull , Oingo Boingo , Siouxsie & the Banshees , Slayer , Sonic Youth , TLC and Karyn White . Other acts scheduled for spring release : Body_Count , Extreme , Jade , L7 and Sir Mix-a-Lot . Looking ahead to summer : Frank Black , Edie Brickell & the New Bohemians , Casual , Danzig , Digable Planets , 4 Non Blondes , Fu-Schnickens , Grand Puba , Amy Grant , Julio Iglesias , In2Deep , the Jesus and Mary Chain , John Fogerty , Ice-T , Joni Mitchell , Nelson , Paris , Pink Floyd , Primus , Prince , Shabba Ranks , Lionel Richie , Izzy Stradlin , SWV , Vanessa Williams , Stevie Wonder . Heidi Siegmund and Dennis Hunt
